Line1.6D03F: (groan) Bloody damn hells. What do you want?
Line11.6D03F: I was attacked, obviously. By vast quantities of alcohol, wielded by my own treacherous hand.
Line13.6D03F: (grunt) There may have also been a brawl with a goat over this...patch of mud. I like to think I triumphed.
Line15.BAE4: Lorath, who is the Pale Man?
Line19.BAE4: Horadrim?! Then you must know him.
Line21.6D03F: (wince) I thought I did once. His name is Elias. He was my apprentice.
Line23.6D03F: He was the one who brought Lilith to Sanctuary.
Line25.6D03F: It is possible that I did not take the news very well.
Line29.6D03F: Find him. Figure out what he has done...
Line3.BAE4: You told me to meet you here, Lorath. Remember?
Line33.6D03F: Listen, there’s a, uh...woman...here someplace. She has some messages we’ll need and...I’m of no use to anyone right now.
Line35.6D03F: Could you find her? Enough time has been wasted.
Line5.6D03F: Of course, I remember. I’m just surprised you’re not dead.
